slides.title: Welcome to Input Tax Credit
slides.content:
# Input Tax Credit (ITC)

ITC is the **backbone of GST** - eliminating cascading taxes.

## What You Will Learn

- **Eligibility** - When to claim
- **Restrictions** - Blocked credits
- **Matching** - GSTR-2A/2B
- **Reversal** - When ITC is lost

## Topics

| Area | Focus |
|------|-------|
| Conditions | Eligibility |
| Blocked | Restrictions |
| Distribution | ISD |
| Reversal | Common credit |

slides.title: ITC Eligibility
slides.content:
# Conditions for ITC

## Section 16(2)

| Condition | Requirement |
|-----------|-------------|
| Possession | Tax invoice/document |
| Receipt | Goods/services received |
| Payment | Tax paid to government |
| Return | Filed by recipient |

## Time Limit

```
ITC must be claimed by:
- 30th November of following FY
- Or date of annual return

Whichever is earlier
```

slides.title: Blocked Credits
slides.content:
# Section 17(5)

## Ineligible ITC

| Category | Examples |
|----------|----------|
| Motor vehicles | Cars (exceptions apply) |
| Food & beverages | Outdoor catering |
| Club membership | Health, fitness |
| Personal consumption | Private use |
| Construction | Immovable property |
| Tax depreciation | Claimed on cost |
| Goods lost | Theft, gift, sample |

## Exceptions

- Motor vehicles for specified business
- Construction for further supply

slides.title: ITC Matching
slides.content:
# GSTR-2A and 2B

## Auto-Population

| Form | Purpose |
|------|--------|
| GSTR-2A | Dynamic statement |
| GSTR-2B | Static monthly |

## Matching Process

```
Claim ITC only if:
- Appears in GSTR-2B
- Or recipient responsibility

Rule 36(4):
Can claim up to 5% extra over GSTR-2B
```

## Mismatch Handling

- Supplier non-compliance
- Communication required
- Reversal if unresolved

slides.title: ITC Reversal - Non-Payment
slides.content:
# 180-Day Rule

## Section 16(2)(d)

```
If payment not made within 180 days:
- Reverse ITC claimed
- Add to output liability
- Interest payable

On payment:
- Re-avail ITC
```

## Calculation

| Scenario | Action |
|----------|--------|
| Full non-payment | Full reversal |
| Partial payment | Proportionate reversal |

slides.title: Common Credit Reversal
slides.content:
# Rule 42 and 43

## Rule 42 - Inputs and Services

```
Common credit reversal:

T1 = Exempt turnover / Total turnover x C2
T2 = 5% of C2

Reverse higher of T1 or T2
(if 5% or less, no reversal)
```

## Rule 43 - Capital Goods

```
Monthly reversal:
Useful life = 60 months
Reverse proportionate to exempt use
```

slides.title: Input Service Distributor
slides.content:
# ISD Mechanism

## Purpose

```
Head office receives invoices
for common services

Distributes credit to branches
where services used
```

## Distribution Rules

| Type | Method |
|------|--------|
| Specific | To that unit |
| Common | Pro-rata turnover |

## Documents

- ISD invoice required
- Must have ISD registration

slides.title: ITC on Capital Goods
slides.content:
# Capital Goods ITC

## Claiming ITC

| Scenario | ITC Available |
|----------|---------------|
| Full business use | 100% |
| Partial exempt | Proportionate |
| Personal use | Nil |

## Disposal

```
If sold within 5 years:
Pay higher of:
- ITC on transaction value
- ITC remaining (for useful life)
```

## Useful Life

- 60 months (5 years)
- Quarterly reduction

slides.title: Job Work ITC
slides.content:
# ITC for Job Work

## Principal's ITC

```
Inputs sent for job work:
- ITC available to principal
- Even if at job worker premises

Condition:
- Goods returned within 1 year
- Or 3 years for capital goods
```

## Failure to Return

| Consequence | Action |
|-------------|--------|
| Deemed supply | Pay GST |
| Plus interest | From due date |

slides.title: Transfer of ITC
slides.content:
# Business Reorganization

## Merger/Demerger

```
ITC balance transfers to:
- Transferee company
- As per scheme order
```

## Change in Constitution

| Event | ITC Transfer |
|-------|-------------|
| Merger | Full transfer |
| Demerger | Proportionate |
| Sale of business | With business |

## Requirements

- Form ITC-02
- Certificate from CA/CMA

slides.title: Refund of ITC
slides.content:
# Unutilized ITC

## Eligible Cases

| Case | Refund Available |
|------|------------------|
| Zero-rated supply | Yes, full |
| Inverted duty | Yes, formula |
| Deemed export | Yes |

## Restrictions

| Case | Refund Available |
|------|------------------|
| Exemption notification | No |
| Nil rated | No |
| Non-taxable | No |

## Formula for Inverted Duty

```
Max Refund = (Turnover of inverted x ITC / Total turnover) - Tax payable
```

slides.title: Annual Reconciliation
slides.content:
# GSTR-9 ITC Matching

## Reconciliation

```
Books ITC
vs
GSTR-3B claimed
vs
GSTR-2A/2B available
```

## Adjustments

| Scenario | Action |
|----------|--------|
| Excess claimed | Pay with interest |
| Short claimed | Claim in GSTR-3B |
| Mismatch | Reconcile and correct |
